creator: tkormann@apache.org
text:
Text highlight does not work with R2L text (and text on a path).
Illustrate via the Find option and some of the text on a path tests.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Works for me with current CVS if you still have problems let me know.
(try find 'left' in the spec/text/textBiDi.svg).  I also selected a chunk
of bidi in the document (rabic: ...) pasted that into the find window. Cleared
the selection and hit find and it found the text I pasted no problem.

If you have some other test that is failing please let me know as I would
expect the above to cover just about all cases.
